title: Technology-Integrated Language Learning and Pedagogical Competency Development Program for Non-Native Pre-Service English Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental English grammar and communication skills at the secondary education level
context.additional_context: A program optimized for smartphone-based learning environments emphasizing learner-led participation and collaborative learning. Preservice teachers simultaneously act as English learners and teachers while developing self-directed learning strategies

learning_goals: Create and share at least three English teaching methodology-related content pieces using Facebook Groups and photovoice techniques
Identify five language learning strategies through peer feedback and self-reflection, and apply them to actual classroom instruction
Produce and submit a 15-minute micro-teaching video based on digital tool competencies acquired in blended learning environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
